titleStmt.title: A proclamation concerning building in, and about London and Westminster
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
At head of title: By the King.
At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehal, the sixteenth day of August, 1661, in the thirteenth year our raign.
Instructing citizens to build buildings of brick to reduce fire hazards.
